snippet: “K2: Siren of the Himalayas” chronicles an attempt to reach the peak of the second-highest mountain in the world in 2009.
abstract: Ben Kenigsberg reviews documentary film K2: Siren of the Himalyas, directed by Dave Ohlson.
lead_paragraph: “K2: Siren of the Himalayas” chronicles an attempt to reach the peak of the second-highest mountain in the world in 2009.

headline.print_headline: A Risky, Chilly Climb to the Top
headline.seo: ‘K2’ Shows Climbers With a Lofty Goal in the Himalayas
headline.main: A Risky, Chilly Climb to the Top
headline.kicker: Movie Review | 'K2: Siren of the Himalayas'
